movie.title: TerrorVision
movie.description_intro: Stan installs satellite TV for his family, but, soon, he picks up a signal from another planet and his television system becomes the gateway between the 2. A creature comes to his apartment and only their son Sherman sees it, but his parents don't believe the boy.
movie.description_full: Stan installs satellite TV for his family, but, soon, he picks up a signal from another planet and his television system becomes the gateway between the 2. A creature comes to his apartment and only their son Sherman sees it, but his parents don't believe the boy.

movies.title: Not Quite Dead Yet
movies.summary: A pharmaceutical CEO is pondering thefts and irregularities at his company. He drinks a drug that temporary suppresses his signs and gives him a deathlike state for a couple of days. Something goes wrong. His daughter and he have had a rocky relationship, but she attempts to rescue him with help from a company employee.
movies.description_full: A pharmaceutical CEO is pondering thefts and irregularities at his company. He drinks a drug that temporary suppresses his signs and gives him a deathlike state for a couple of days. Something goes wrong. His daughter and he have had a rocky relationship, but she attempts to rescue him with help from a company employee.

movies.title: Eric Andre: Legalize Everything
movies.summary: Eric Andre takes the stage in New Orleans and tackles flawed fast-food icons, the wonders of autofill and the bizarre choice for the "Cops" theme song.
movies.description_full: Eric Andre takes the stage in New Orleans and tackles flawed fast-food icons, the wonders of autofill and the bizarre choice for the "Cops" theme song.
movies.synopsis: Eric Andre takes the stage in New Orleans and tackles flawed fast-food icons, the wonders of autofill and the bizarre choice for the "Cops" theme song.

movies.title: The New Testament
movies.summary: Based on Guitry's own stage play about a sanctimonious fellow who is eventually victimized by his own hypocrisy.
movies.description_full: Based on Guitry's own stage play about a sanctimonious fellow who is eventually victimized by his own hypocrisy.
movies.synopsis: Based on Guitry's own stage play about a sanctimonious fellow who is eventually victimized by his own hypocrisy.

movies.title: Ant-Man
movies.summary: Armed with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, con-man Scott Lang must embrace his inner-hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, protect the secret behind his spectacular Ant-Man suit from a new generation of towering threats. Against seemingly insurmountable obstacles, Pym and Lang must plan and pull off a heist that will save the world.
movies.description_full: Armed with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, con-man Scott Lang must embrace his inner-hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, protect the secret behind his spectacular Ant-Man suit from a new generation of towering threats. Against seemingly insurmountable obstacles, Pym and Lang must plan and pull off a heist that will save the world.
